pageContext.claim: “Opinion Editor at @nytimes just walked out. That’s right, he quit over the excellent Op-Ed penned by our great Senator @TomCottonAR. TRANSPARENCY! The State of Arkansas is very proud of Tom. The New York Times is Fake News!!!”
pageContext.analysis: Former New York Times Opinion Editor James Bennet resigned after the newsroom erupted in protest following the publication of a factually-flawed op-ed from Sen. Tom Cotton (R-Ark.) that “fell short of [New York Times] standards.”
